details.callToWorship: O for a Thousand Tongues to Sing #216
details.fellowshipSong: I Will Sing of My Redeemer #575

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: Today's evening service will be held at Rawlings-Stinson park at 6:00 PM. Bring some lawn chairs and your singing voice!
There is a Pastor Appreciation Box in the foyer. You can place cards inside for Pastor Ken through next Sunday. We love you, Pastor Ken!
We will hold a treat giveaway during county trick or treat hours in front of Subway on Thursday, 10/31 from 5:00-7:00 PM. Please sign up in the foyer.
Homecoming is Sunday, November 10. Allen Roberts will preach with a fellowship meal to follow.
